channel.title: Clarke Quay on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Clarke Quay on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Friday - Black Peper Crab
item.description: On Friday we woke up early; had breakfast- an elaborate one. Me and Aarush after shower around 11am left our hotel room. Today again we walked on other side of Orchard Streettill Dhoby Ghat Station. Now a days; I too feel sick like my hubby when too much time spent at malls … am I growing old ? :D It was good to be in mall when it is raining.
